Quote: The following is a work of fiction.
This is a story of boy meets girl.

Tom meets Summer on January 8.
He knows almost immediately she's who he's been searching for.
“I think we should stop seeing each other.”
Desc:
Summer breaks up over pancakes 
& Sister consoles

Quote: “Uh everyone, this is Summer, my new assistant.”
“Color my life with the chaos of trouble.”

“Why is it that pretty girls think they can treat people like crap and get away with it?
Centuries of reinforcement.”

“Today you're a man. 
Mazel tov on your bar mitzvah.”
“I think it's official. I'm in love with Summer.”

“And we talked about Bananafish for like 20 minutes. 
We're so compatible, it's insane.”

“People don't realize this,
but loneliness is underrated.”
“This Friday, all you can karaoke at the Mill.”

♪ Cause I'm in Su-Su-Su ♪
♪ Sugar Town ♪

“Ah, hon? Our sink is broken.
Man, all of our sinks are broken.”

“Darling, I don't know how to tell you this, but…
there's a Chinese family in our bathroom.”

♪ You make my dreams come true! ♪ 
♪ Ooh-ooh you ooh-ooh! ♪

“Well, you know, Henry Miller said the best way to get over a woman… 
is to turn her into literature.”

♪ too too tututoo ♪
“Your girl is losing it.”

“You know what?
That looks pretty doable.”
Desc: Goes to movie store & then shower

Quote: “This is my favorite spot.”

“I've never told anybody that before.”
“I guess I'm not just anybody.”

“What's going on here, with us?
I don't know. Who cares? I'm happy. Aren't you happy?”
Desc: Talks with sister, goes to watch movie

Quote: “You're serious? This guy?”

“I need to know that you're not gonna wake up in the morning… and… feel differently. 
And I can't give you that. Nobody can.”
“It's very complex. In a way, it sort of, like, says… so much… by saying so little.”
“He is broken. More than broken, he is alone. Now his only friend is grief.”
“Funerals and sympathy. Misery, sadness, loss offaith, no reason to live. This is perfect for you.”
“How about, "Every day you make me proud, but today you get a card."”
“I hate Summer… And I hate her cockroach-shaped splotch on her neck.”
“There's two options really. Either she's an evil, emotionless, miserable human being, or she's a robot.”

Desc: Meets Summer on Train to Millie's Marriage

Quote:
“Why make something disposable, like a building, when you can make something
that lasts forever, like a greeting card?”
♪ Tring tring! ♪

(To a couple) 
“Get a room, really!”

“What does that even mean, ''love''? Do you know? Do you? Anybody? 
If somebody gave me this card, Mr. Vance, I would eat it.”
“Look, I know you think that she was the one, but I don't. Now, I think you're just remembering the good stuff.”

“My name's Tom.”
“Nice to meet you. I'm Autumn.”
